For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. iPhone 17 Pro MaxThe iPhone 17 Pro Max represents the pinnacle of Apple’s innovation, combining cutting-edge performance, advanced camera technology, and refined design into a single flagship device. Built with precision, it features a Ceramic Shield 2 front and an aluminum alloy frame, ensuring durability while maintaining a premium feel. With its expansive 6.9-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display, users experience breathtaking visuals, vibrant colors, and smooth 120Hz refresh rates, making it ideal for everything from professional content creation to immersive entertainment.Powered by the new Apple A19 Pro chipset built on 3nm architecture, the iPhone 17 Pro Max delivers unparalleled speed, efficiency, and graphics performance. Coupled with up to 12GB of RAM and storage options up to 2TB, it is designed to handle professional-grade workflows and demanding applications effortlessly. The device also features an improved battery system with fast wired and wireless charging support, ensuring power is always within reach.Photography and videography enthusiasts will appreciate the triple 48MP camera system with wide, ultrawide, and periscope telephoto lenses, offering up to 4x optical zoom and professional-level stabilization. Combined with ProRes, ProRes RAW, Apple Log 2, and Dolby Vision HDR support, the iPhone 17 Pro Max is a powerhouse for both creators and everyday users who demand cinematic quality. The 18MP selfie camera with advanced 3D depth sensing further enhances portraits and video calls, supported by Apple’s spatial audio technology.Connectivity reaches new heights with 5G SA/NSA, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, and satellite-based features for emergency messaging and location services. The device is IP68 certified for water and dust resistance, making it reliable in all environments. Available in Silver, Cosmic Orange, and Deep Blue, the iPhone 17 Pro Max combines elegance with next-generation performance.Key Features:6.9-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display with 3000 nits peak brightnessApple A19 Pro chipset (3nm) with 12GB RAM and up to 2TB storageTriple 48MP Pro camera system with periscope telephoto and LiDAR scannerProfessional-grade video: ProRes, ProRes RAW, Dolby Vision HDR, Apple Log 218MP front camera with 3D depth sensing and spatial audio supportAdvanced connectivity: 5G SA/NSA/Sub-6, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, UWB Gen2Durable design with Ceramic Shield 2 and IP68 water resistanceLong-lasting battery with 50% charge in 20 minutes (wired) or 30 minutes (wireless)Satellite-based SOS, messaging, and Find My support

Powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset built on a 4nm process, it delivers lightning-fast speeds and desktop-class efficiency for gaming, streaming, and multitasking.Its dual 50MP Ultra-Clear camera system, featuring the premium LYT-700 sensor from the OnePlus 13 series, captures every shot with professional-grade clarity. With OIS stabilization, your photos and videos come out sharp, steady, and vibrant—whether it’s day or night.Up front, the massive 6.83-inch Swift AMOLED display offers an ultra-smooth 144Hz refresh rate and 3840Hz PWM dimming, reducing eye strain during extended viewing or gaming sessions. It comes with up to 12GB RAM and UFS 3.1 storage, ensuring smooth multitasking and fast app loading. It was released on 2024, November 01. OnePlus 13 has 6.82 inch, LTPO 4.1 AMOLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, HDR Vivid, 800 nits (typ), 1600 nits (HBM), 4500 nits (peak), a resolution of 1440 x 3168 pixels screen with Ceramic Guard glass. OPPO Reno13 F 4G (8/256GB)Introducing the OPPO Reno13 F 4G (8/256GB), a sleek and powerful smartphone that combines impressive technology with cutting-edge features. Whether you're a photography enthusiast, a gaming aficionado, or someone who simply loves a smooth user experience, this device has everything you need. Available at Gadget & Gear in Bangladesh, the OPPO Reno13 F 4G offers outstanding value and performance. Let's dive into its key features and specifications.Key Features of OPPO Reno13 FThe OPPO Reno13 F 4G is designed to meet the demands of modern users, offering a combination of impressive display quality, powerful performance, and versatile camera options. Here are some standout features: Experience a vibrant and immersive visual experience with the OPPO Reno13 F 4G’s 6.67-inch AMOLED display. With a resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixels, you can enjoy sharp details, vivid colors, and crisp clarity. The 120Hz refresh rate ensures ultra-smooth scrolling, perfect for gaming, browsing, and video streaming. Whether you're indoors or outside, the screen's peak brightness of 1200 nits ensures optimal visibility even in bright conditions.Powerful PerformanceUnder the hood, the OPPO Reno13 F 4G is powered by the MediaTek Helio G100 chipset, featuring an 8-core CPU and ARM G57 MC2 GPU for excellent processing power. With 8GB of RAM and 256GB of internal storage, you’ll experience fast app launches, smooth multitasking, and ample space for your apps, photos, and videos. Whether you're working or gaming, this device handles it all with ease.Exceptional Camera CapabilitiesThe OPPO Reno13 F 4G stands out with its impressive camera setup. The rear camera features a 50MP wide-angle lens, an 8MP ultra-wide-angle lens, and a 2MP macro lens, allowing you to capture stunning shots in any scenario. Whether you're shooting photos, videos, or exploring creative modes like Dual-view video and Slo-mo, the camera delivers exceptional results. The 32MP front camera is perfect for selfies and video calls, ensuring clear, detailed, and vibrant shots.Long-lasting Battery and Fast ChargingStay powered throughout your day with the OPPO Reno13 F 4G's 5800mAh battery. With 45W fast charging support, you can quickly recharge your phone and get back to enjoying its many features without waiting for long. Whether you're gaming, watching movies, or working, the Reno13 F’s battery life is designed to keep up with your busy lifestyle. Stay connected with the latest in wireless technology. The OPPO Reno13 F 4G supports 4G LTE, Wi-Fi 5, Bluetooth 5.3, and NFC for fast and stable connections. With a USB Type-C port and OTG support, you can enjoy seamless data transfers and charge your phone with ease. Plus, with a range of GPS services including Beidou, GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, and QZSS, navigation is accurate and reliable wherever you go.

(180 falls)Repairability: Class CiPhone 18 Pro Max (2025) – DescriptionThe iPhone 18 Pro Max 2025 comes with a refined design and powerful performance. It supports GSM, CDMA, HSPA, EVDO, LTE, and 5G networks, ensuring global connectivity. The device was announced on September 9, 2025, and released on September 19, 2025.Its body is built with a Ceramic Shield 2 glass front, aluminum alloy frame, and aluminum alloy/glass back, making it highly durable. It measures 163.4 × 78 × 8.8 mm and weighs just 233 grams. The phone is IP68 certified, resistant to dust and water (up to 6m for 30 minutes). It also supports Apple Pay.The display features a 6.9-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED panel with 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10, Dolby Vision, and up to 3000 nits peak brightness. Protection is enhanced by Ceramic Shield 2 and Anti-reflective coating.In terms of performance, the device runs on iOS 26 and is powered by the Apple A19 Pro (3nm) chipset. It features a Hexa-core CPU and a 6-core Apple GPU. Storage options include 256GB, 512GB, 1TB, and 2TB NVMe, all paired with 12GB RAM.For photography, it offers a triple 48MP camera setup – wide, periscope telephoto (4x optical zoom), and ultrawide – along with a TOF 3D LiDAR scanner. Video recording supports 4K up to 120fps, 1080p up to 240fps, ProRes, ProRes RAW, Dolby Vision HDR, and Apple Log 2. The selfie camera includes an 18MP OIS sensor + SL 3D biometric sensor, supporting 4K video, HDR, and Dolby Vision.Audio comes through stereo speakers, though there is no 3.5mm jack. Connectivity includes Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, GPS (with NavIC), NFC, and USB Type-C 3.2 Gen 2 (with DisplayPort).Additional features include Face ID, UWB gen2 chip, Emergency SOS, Messages & Find My via satellite.The battery comes in two versions:4832 mAh (Nano-SIM model)5088 mAh (eSIM-only model)Charging features: PD3.2 fast charging (50% in 20 minutes), 25W MagSafe/Qi2 wireless charging (50% in 30 minutes, 15W in China), and 4.5W reverse wired charging.The iPhone 18 Pro Max is available in Silver, Cosmic Orange, and Deep Blue. Model numbers include iPhone18,2, A3526, A3257, A3527, A3525.According to EU labeling, the phone has an Energy Class A rating, battery endurance of 53 hours and 1000 cycles, Free fall Class B (180 falls) resistance, and a Repairability rating of Class C.

It has 5MP Dual main camera, 5MP Single selfie camera. vivo V50 uses Si/C 6000 mAh battery.Design and DisplayThe vivo V50 features a curved AMOLED display and a slim design despite its large battery. It comes in Rose Red, Starry Night, and Titanium Grey color options. The device includes an optical fingerprint scanner and stereo speakers.The display measures 6.77 inches with a 120Hz refresh rate. It supports HDR content and reaches 1500 nits at peak and 1300 nits under sunlight (HBM mode).Performance and SoftwareThe phone runs on the same processor as its predecessor. The Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 processor is paired with up to 12GB RAM and 512GB storage. The Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 is a decent chipset that can handle most games at a satisfactory level. Meanwhile, the vivo V50 supports Wi-Fi 6 + 6GHz band.

It features a stunning 6.9-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, Dolby Vision, HDR10, and an incredible peak brightness of 3000 nits. For durability, it comes with Ceramic Shield 2 protection and an anti-reflective coating.Powered by the latest Apple A19 Pro (3nm) chipset and a Hexa-core CPU, along with Apple’s 6-core GPU, the device ensures lightning-fast performance. Running on iOS 26, it delivers the smoothest user experience yet. Storage options start at 256GB and go up to a massive 2TB NVMe, all paired with 12GB of RAM.The camera system is flagship-level, consisting of:48MP wide lens with dual-pixel PDAF and sensor-shift OIS48MP periscope telephoto lens with 4x optical zoom and advanced 3D sensor-shift OIS48MP ultrawide lens (120° field of view)TOF 3D LiDAR scanner for depth sensing and ARFor video, it supports up to 4K at 120fps with Dolby Vision HDR, 10-bit HDR, ProRes RAW, Apple Log 2, and even 3D spatial video with immersive audio.On the front, it houses an 18MP ultra-wide selfie camera with PDAF, OIS, and an SL 3D depth/biometric sensor. It can shoot videos up to 4K@60fps with gyro-EIS stabilization.Connectivity options include Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, multi-band GPS with NavIC, NFC, and USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 with DisplayPort. For security and advanced features, it offers Face ID, second-gen Ultra Wideband (UWB), and satellite-based Emergency SOS, Messages, and Find My.The phone comes in two battery variants:4832 mAh (Nano-SIM model)5088 mAh (eSIM-only model)Charging speeds are impressive with 50% charge in just 20 minutes using PD3.2 wired fast charging. Wireless charging supports 25W MagSafe/Qi2 (50% in 30 minutes) and 15W in China. It also supports 4.5W reverse wired charging.Overall, this smartphone is a true ultra-premium flagship, delivering excellence across performance, display, camera, connectivity, and battery life.

details.description_text: Tecno Spark 40 (6/128GB)Display: 6.67' inches, IPS LCD Processor: Mediatek Helio G81 Camera: 50MP, 8MP Features: Fingerprint (side-mounted) DescriptionOperating SystemAndroid 15ProcessorHelio G81Network2G3G4GDimension165.6x77x7.67mmDisplay120Hz 6.67'' Hole ScreenResolution720*1600CameraFront: 8MP, Front Dual FlashRear: 50MP, Rear Dual FlashMemory128GB+12GB* (6GB Extended RAM)256GB+16GB* (8GB Extended RAM)ConnectivityGPSWiFiBTFMOTGSensorSoftware GyroscopeSide Fingerprint SensorInfrared Remote ControlBattery Capacity5200mAh45W Super ChargingLoudspeakerDual SpeakersDTS SoundTecno Spark 40 (6/128GB)The Tecno Spark 40 (6/128GB) is your perfect pick. With its sleek design, ultra-smooth display, and a big battery that keeps up with your lifestyle, this latest release from Tecno is winning hearts in Bangladesh. Whether you're a student, a multitasker, or someone who loves entertainment on the go, the Spark 40 is engineered to deliver the essentials and then some. Smartphones in this price range often come with compromises, but the Tecno Spark 40 manages to stand out by blending top-tier features with affordability. Its 6.67-inch HD+ display, lightning-fast 120Hz refresh rate, and a feature-packed 50MP dual rear camera offer you a premium smartphone experience at a mid-range budget. Add to that a solid Mediatek Helio G81 processor, a generous 6GB RAM, and 128GB storage, and you get a phone that’s ready for multitasking, gaming, and everything in between. Running on the latest Android 15, this phone is as modern and future-ready as it gets.Tecno Spark 40 SpecificationEnjoy smooth scrolling and vibrant visuals on a large 6.67-inch IPS LCD display. Whether you’re binge-watching your favorite shows or scrolling through social media, the 720x1600 resolution combined with a 120Hz refresh rate makes your experience fluid and immersive. Tecno ensures this is not just another basic screen it’s your portable entertainment hub. Under the hood, the MediaTek Helio G81 chipset delivers consistent, lag-free performance for all your day-to-day tasks. From gaming to multitasking, the Spark 40 runs effortlessly. Paired with 6GB of RAM, app switching is smooth and responsive, while the 128GB of internal storage means you have enough space for apps, photos, and files with the option to expand via OTG support.Display Size: 6.67'' Hole ScreenDisplay Type: IPS LCDResolution: 720*1600Refresh Rate: 120HzProcessor: Mediatek Helio G81RAM: 6GBROM: 128GBRear Camera: 50MPFront Camera: 8MPSpeaker: Dual SpeakersSIM: Nano-SIM + Nano-SIMNetwork: 2G/ 3G/ 4GOperating System: Android 15Fingerprint: Side Fingerprint SensorBattery: 5200mAhFast Charging: 45W Super ChargingCapture More with Camera & SpeakersThe 50MP rear camera, equipped with dual flash, allows you to shoot clear, detailed photos even in low light. Whether it’s a sunset or a selfie moment, the 8MP front camera ensures you look your best. The Tecno Spark 40 turns every photo into a memory worth sharing. Music lovers and movie buffs will appreciate the dual stereo speakers enhanced with DTS Sound technology. The immersive audio makes your favorite content come alive, offering richer bass and clear trebles that stand out even in noisy environments.All-Day Power Battery and Smart FeaturesStay unplugged longer with a 5200mAh battery designed to keep up with your daily demands. Running low? No worries. The 45W Super Charging quickly powers up your device so you're ready to go in no time ideal for those always on the move. Experience the best of Android with version 15 right out of the box. The Tecno Spark 40 is packed with smart features like a side-mounted fingerprint sensor for easy unlocking, infrared remote control, and a software-based gyroscope for enhanced gaming and AR applications.Connectivity That Keeps You ConnectedWith 4G network support, dual nano SIM slots, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS, and USB Type-C, the Tecno Spark 40 ensures you're always connected whether you're at home, work, or on the go. OTG support also adds versatility by allowing you to connect USB accessories directly. At just 7.67mm thick, the Spark 40 feels great in hand without compromising on screen size or battery. Its compact 165.6x77mm body makes it both elegant and practical, ensuring it's easy to carry yet bold in appearance.

Its 6.67-inch HD+ display, lightning-fast 120Hz refresh rate, and a feature-packed 50MP dual rear camera offer you a premium smartphone experience at a mid-range budget. Add to that a solid Mediatek Helio G81 processor, a generous 6GB RAM, and 128GB storage, and you get a phone that’s ready for multitasking, gaming, and everything in between. Tecno ensures this is not just another basic screen it’s your portable entertainment hub. For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. iPhone 17 Pro MaxThe iPhone 17 Pro Max represents the pinnacle of Apple’s innovation, combining cutting-edge performance, advanced camera technology, and refined design into a single flagship device. Built with precision, it features a Ceramic Shield 2 front and an aluminum alloy frame, ensuring durability while maintaining a premium feel. With its expansive 6.9-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display, users experience breathtaking visuals, vibrant colors, and smooth 120Hz refresh rates, making it ideal for everything from professional content creation to immersive entertainment.Powered by the new Apple A19 Pro chipset built on 3nm architecture, the iPhone 17 Pro Max delivers unparalleled speed, efficiency, and graphics performance. The device is IP68 certified for water and dust resistance, making it reliable in all environments. If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering.BrandNothingBody163.5 x 77.5 x 8.4 mm | 201 g | 3 LED light strips on the back (notifications, camera fill light)PlatformAndroid 15, Nothing OS 3.1 | Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 (4 nm) | Octa-core | Adreno 710ModelNothing Phone 3ANetworkGSM / HSPA / LTE / 5GDisplayAMOLED | 1B colors | 120Hz | HDR10+ | 800 nits (typ) | 1300 nits (HBM) | 3000 nits (peak) | 6.77 inches | Panda Glass | Always On DisplayMemory128GB 8GB RAM | 256GB 8GB RAMMain Camera50 MP, f/1.9, (wide), PDAF, OIS | 50 MP, (telephoto), PDAF, 2x optical zoom | 8 MP, f/2.2, 119˚ (ultrawide) | LED flash, panorama, HDR | 4K@30fps, 1080p@60/120fps, gyro-EISSelfie Camera32 MP, f/2.5, (wide) | HDR | 1080p@60fpsSoundLoudspeaker | Stereo speakersBattery Info5000 mAh | Non-removable | 50W wired ChargingOther Features / InfoIP64 - splash, water and dust resistant | Fingerprint (under display, optical) | USB Type-C 2.0, OTGDescription Nothing Phone (3a)The smartphone that you have all been waiting for, the Nothing Phone 3a. An ambitious piece of tech. You still get the dramatic back design which is sure to catch attention in the room. The LED strips on the back or the glyph as Nothing calls it, can be customized to specific notifications and lots of other tasks like reminders. There is also the 6.77-inch AMOLED display which offers vibrant visuals and deep blacks. Now it’s not all about what's on the surface, it’s what’s underneath. The Nothing Phone 3a comes with the Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chip, making it just powerful enough to keep you ahead of the pack without breaking the bank. All in all, this is one fantastic phone which has everything you would need on a budget. details.description_text: Honor X5b 4/64GBThe Honor X5b is a feature-packed smartphone designed to offer powerful performance, a large display, and exceptional camera capabilities. With a 6.56-inch TFT LCD display, 13MP rear camera, 5MP front camera, and a long-lasting 20,000mAh battery, this phone is built for everyday use, whether you’re working, gaming, or capturing memories on the go. Powered by the MediaTek Helio G36 octa-core processor and running on MagicOS 8.0 (based on Android 14), it ensures a smooth and efficient experience.6.56-inch with 90Hz display 64GB stroage and microSDXC slot Fingerprint sensor 5200mAh battery capacity HONOR X5b 4GB/64GB Specifications Additional Features: 90Hz Bright & Dynamic Display | Magic Capsule | AI Object Recognition | AI Clarity Enhancement | Knuckle Screenshots | Power Button with Fingerprint | Face RecognitionOS: MagicOS 8.0 Based on Android 14Chipset: MediaTek Helio G36CPU: Octa-core (4x Cortex-A53 up to 2.2Ghz + 4x Cortex-A53 up to 1.6Ghz)GPU: IMG GE8320RAM: 4GBROM: 64GBNetwork: 2G/3G/4GSIM Card Slot: Dual Nano SIM + MicroSD (Expandable up to 1TB)Display: 6.56” TFT LCD Water Drop Screen Display | Resolution: 720x1612 | Refresh Rate: 90Hz | Aspect Ratio: 20.15:09 | Color: 16.7 million colors | Gestures: Multi-touch gestures (up to 10 touch points supported)Rear Camera: 13MP Main Camera + Auxiliary Camera | 10x Digital zoom | LED flashCamera Mechanism: Aperture: f/1.8 | Resolution: 4160×3120Photography: Portrait (including beauty mode and bokeh), High-Res, WatermarkVideo: 720/1080P@30fps | Resolution: 1920x1080Front Camera: 5MPCamera Mechanism: Aperture: f/2.2 | Resolution: 2592x1944Photography: Portrait (including beauty mode and bokeh)Video: 1080P (1920x1080) Recording | Resolution: 1920x1080Battery & Charging: 5200mAh Li-On Polymer Battery | Wired Charging: 5V/2A | USB Type-CConnectivity: Wi-Fi | Bluetooth 5.1 | PC Data Sync | OTG | GPS | USB 2.0 | 3.5mm JackSensors: Gravity Sensor | Ambient Light Sensor | Proximity Sensor | Fingerprint SensorHonor X5b 4/64GBThe Honor X5b is a feature-packed smartphone designed to offer powerful performance, a large display, and exceptional camera capabilities. With a 6.56-inch TFT LCD display, 13MP rear camera, 5MP front camera, and a long-lasting 20,000mAh battery, this phone is built for everyday use, whether you’re working, gaming, or capturing memories on the go. Powered by the MediaTek Helio G36 octa-core processor and running on MagicOS 8.0 (based on Android 14), it ensures a smooth and efficient experience.Features of Honor X5b6.56-Inch Display, Powered by MediaTek Helio G36 Octa-Core Processor, 13MP Rear Camera, Fast Charging and Long Battery Life.6.56-Inch DisplayThe Honor X5b features a 6.56-inch TFT LCD display with a 720 x 1612 resolution, delivering vibrant colors and sharp visuals for all your favorite apps, games, and media. Whether you’re browsing, watching videos, or enjoying a game, the large display ensures an immersive viewing experience with clear, crisp details.Powered by MediaTek Helio G36 Octa-Core ProcessorUnder the hood, the Honor X5b is equipped with the MediaTek Helio G36 chipset, an octa-core processor with speeds of up to 2.2GHz (4 Cortex-A53 cores) and 1.6GHz (4 Cortex-A53 cores). This powerful CPU ensures smooth performance for everyday tasks, from browsing the web to running apps, making it perfect for users who want a reliable, responsive phone.13MP Rear CameraThe 13MP rear camera of the Honor X5b allows you to capture high-quality photos and videos. With an f/1.8 aperture, it performs well in low-light conditions, ensuring clear and vibrant photos no matter the lighting. You can also shoot 720p and 1080p videos at 30fps, perfect for capturing your special moments.Fast Charging and Long Battery LifeThe Honor X5b is equipped with a Lithium-ion polymer battery that offers reliable, long-lasting power. With 5V/2A fast charging, you can quickly recharge your device and get back to using it. The phone is designed to keep you connected all day with its efficient battery performance, allowing you to enjoy media, games, and apps for hours without interruption.
